summary: The module provides a suite of unit tests for the geometry generation and parsing utilities in the imod package, covering ASCII representations of linestrings (2D/3D, various delimiters), column handling, error conditions, and conversion to shapely/geopandas objects.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness of geometry format handling, ensuring that ASCII geometry strings are parsed accurately, edge cases such as empty or truncated columns are managed, and conversions to shapely/geopandas structures behave as expected.
